Detailed Description

Low-level routiones for curvature registration based on FFTW.

Typedef Documentation

typedef deltaPlan_t* deltaPlan
 

General plan for comutations with the laplace operator. Holds worspace and variables for 2 and 3 dimensional transforms

Author:
Stefan Heldman
Date:
19/04/2005

Definition at line 44 of file curvature.h.

Function Documentation

deltaPlan createDeltaPlan2D (  int  m1,
int  m2,
double  h1,
double  h2,
boundary_t  bc,
gridsymmetry_t  gs
) 
 

creates and initializes the delta for 2 dimensonal transforms

Author:
Stefan Heldman
Date:
19/04/2005
Parameters:
m1 First dimensions of an 2d linear array stored in colum-major-order.
m2 second dimensions of an 2d linear array stored in colum-major-order.
tau timestep parameter for solving.
alpha regularizaion parameter
Note:
Column-major order means the elements of a m1-by-m2 array A with m1 columns and m2 rows are accesed by A(i,j) = A[i+m1*j]

Definition at line 31 of file curvature.c.

deltaPlan createDeltaPlan3D (  int  m1,
int  m2,
int  m3,
double  h1,
double  h2,
double  h3,
boundary_t  bc,
gridsymmetry_t  gs
) 
 

creates and initializes the delta for 3 dimensonal transforms

Author:
Stefan Heldman
Date:
19/04/2005
Parameters:
m1 First dimensions of an 3d linear array stored in colum-major-order.
m2 second dimensions of an 2d linear array stored in colum-major-order.
m3 second dimensions of an 2d linear array stored in colum-major-order.
tau timestep parameter for solving.
alpha regularizaion parameter
Note:
Column-major order means the elements of a m1-by-m2-by-m3 array A with m1 columns and m2 rows and m3 slices are accesed by A(i,j,k) = A[i+m1*(j+m2*k)]
